instruction: Set up the main App component with React Router and routes for Login, Signup, Dashboard, Clients, Projects, Invoices, Reports, and Settings pages.
Create a responsive Navbar using Tailwind CSS with links to Dashboard, Clients, Projects, and Invoices. Include a logo area and profile icon.
Build a collapsible Sidebar using Tailwind CSS with navigation links and active state highlighting.
Design a clean login page using Tailwind CSS with email and password fields, a login button, and a gradient background.
Create a Signup page similar to Login with inputs for name, email, and password. Add a styled register button.
Create a dashboard page that shows total income, clients, projects, and invoices summary in Tailwind-styled cards.
Create a Recharts line chart that displays monthly income. Include labels, grid, and tooltip styling.
Build a reusable StatCard component to display metrics like total clients, active projects, and pending invoices.
Create a Clients page displaying a table of clients with columns for name, company, and contact info. Include an Add Client button.
Create a ClientForm component with input fields for client name, company, email, and phone. Use Tailwind forms and validation.
Create a Projects page listing projects in a table with columns for project name, client, deadline, and status.
Create a ProjectCard component to show project details including name, client, progress bar, and colored status badge.
Create an Invoices page listing all invoices in a table with columns for invoice number, client, date, and amount.
Create a compact InvoiceCard showing invoice details and payment status badge using Tailwind CSS.
Create a modal for adding a new invoice. Include fields for client selection, amount, and date using Tailwind forms.
Create a notification bell icon using React Toastify that triggers toast notifications for upcoming tasks.
Create a small panel listing upcoming tasks and reminders styled with Tailwind CSS cards.
Create a simple footer component with centered text and a muted Tailwind color scheme.
Create a Settings page for managing user profile and preferences using Tailwind-styled input fields.
Create a custom React hook to manage authentication state, login, and logout functions using localStorage for token storage.
Create a React Context for authentication with provider and consumer for managing user data globally.
Write a helper function to format numbers into currency format like $12,340.50.
Create helper functions to format dates and calculate due days or remaining time for projects.
Create a simple Tailwind-based loading spinner component with smooth animation.
Create a reusable EmptyState component that shows a friendly message when no data is available.
Add a dark/light mode toggle button using Tailwind dark classes and store user preference in localStorage.
Create a breadcrumb navigation component using Tailwind for spacing and active route highlight.
Build a Reports page showing multiple charts for income, project status, and client activity using Recharts.
Create a small summary card displaying total income, styled with Tailwind and a positive/negative trend icon.
